summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of tram simulator website. All 7 pages functional with bilingual support (EN/HU). Navigation, language toggle, mobile responsiveness, and interactive elements working correctly. Design follows requested grey color scheme with rounded corners.
passed_tests: Homepage hero section with background image and CTA button
Navigation bar with all 7 pages (Home, Gallery, News, Team, FAQ, Vehicles, Contact)
Language toggle button (EN/HU) functionality on all pages
Gallery page with 6 images and hover effects
News page with 4 news articles, dates, images, and read more buttons
Team page with 6 team members with photos, names, roles, and bios
FAQ page with accordion functionality (8 questions)
Vehicles page with 6 vehicle cards showing specs (speed, capacity, year)
Contact page with 4 social media cards (Discord, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube)
Rounded corners on all cards and buttons (soft design)
